Drag the map into your belt bar to make it active. You will then be able to view the map by holding down the map button (G by default).

Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

1242522330.description: A spooky cast iron cauldron with a green goo.

1258768145.name: Sunglasses

1414245162.name: Note
1414245162.description: A scrap of paper for leaving notes.

1491753484.name: Medium Frankenstein Torso

A balanced torso.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

1512054436.name: Potato Clone
1512054436.description: A Clipping of a Potato Plant.

1521286012.name: Double Sign Post
1521286012.description: A double sign post that you can plant into terrain.

A pumpkin that you can carve. 

Requires wood as a fuel source.

Combined at a Frankenstein Table to create your very own monster.

Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-1509851560.description: Cooked Deer Meat. Eating it will restore some health, hunger, and thirst.

A Cheap door to secure your base. Its vulnerability to fire and weak explosive resistance makes the door a temporary solution to securing your base. Due to its flaws you should look at upgrading to a higher tier door such as Sheet Metal.

The Wooden Door can take two kinds of locks the basic Key Lock and the Code Lock. To pick up the door, remove any locks and open, hold down the E (USE) key and select 'Pickup'.

If the key is lost, you cannot make another, so don't forget to make extras and put them in a safe place!

-1776128552.name: Green Berry Seed

These green berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

Hemp seeds can be found when picking wild Hemp. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional cloth.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more cloth and faster groth.

Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

Pumpkin Seeds can be found when picking wild Pumpkin plants. These seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Pumpkins and faster groth.

-992286106.name: White Berry Seed
-992286106.description:
These white berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

These yellow berry seeds can be planted in the ground and grown to collect additional food.


Planting these seeds in a planter, and then watering them with large quantities of water yields significantly more Corn and faster groth.

-176608084.description: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

-1997698639.description: A pair of sunglasses. Functional and stylish!

-1850571427.description: Significantly reduces the sound of gunfire, and completely removes any visible muzzle flash.

-855748505.description: A poorly made sight, slightly better than iron sights.

-144417939.description: A tool used to make connections between electrical objects. Aim at an object and click on an input/output handle. you can then click on another object's input/output handle to form a connection. holding right mouse will clear or cancel a connection.
